message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob, but $130 is already a competitive price. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but I can't go as low as $90.  Would you consider $105? This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
